name: My Heavenly Duty
description:
Controls:

W A S D Movement

E- Pick up nearby items

Q - Skip Dialogue Text (When you can)

Left Shift - Use stamina (Only used when your soul is extracted)

Left Click - Attack with  weapon. Also used for a few other functions in the game.

This game was made for the Mini Game Jam 70 with the theme Heaven.

Background: The cursed angel approached the player and fought them because it felt like it. After utterly losing to the angel, it decided, as a reward for winning, to turn you into a stone of their choice. They turned you into a non living moai stone because to the cursed angel, it looked hideous and horrendous. The question is now, will this still pose a problem for the cursed angel and will you be able to overcome it? Only you can find out.

Credits

Unity Assets used:

Free Pixel Font: Thaleah - TinyWorlds

Songs used:

Danger Streets by Shiru: https://soundcloud.com/shiru8bit/danger-streets?in=shiru8bit/sets/raw-chiptune

Strike the Earth(Plains of Passage) - Shovel Knight OST by Jake Kaufman

CastleVanias 2 by Kenichi Matsubara

Strange Memories of Death - Gimmick! by Masashi Kageyama and Naohisa Morota
